title: Installing League again and now it's stuck at 33%
body:
It either stays at 33% for an extremely long time or it just stays there, right now it's just staying there. When it got to 99% it just stayed at 99% I think.

I've tried installing League about three times and it's done it all of those times.

http://imgur.com/HIhkfav

replies.body:
Hey Raleko,

There are a few things that you can try to bypass this patching problem. This is generally an issue with security certificates in Internet Explorer. You can find a guide to making sure all your settings are correct [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944).
